message.content:
The task is to identify the specific line item representing the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This corresponds to the depreciation expense in the cash flow statement.

Looking at the provided cash flow statement:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Depreciation  | 91498.88 | 2024-02-05 |

The line item "Depreciation" represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. The value associated with it is 91498.88.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91498.88'} }
```
